entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries later this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
